title: Lamar Odom Opens Up About Cocaine Addiction, Cheating in Wild Interview​
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
"If there is one thing I regret when I was married," he said, "it was having multiple affairs with different women. That wasn’t the stand-up thing to do. I wish I could have kept my d**k in my pants." 
Yeah, he wasn't sugar-coating anything. From there, he candidly explained the depths of his addiction to cocaine, providing graphic details about his dependency on the drug. 
"My life was all about drugs at that point," he said. "It probably helped the end of my career come along a little faster because drugs killed my drive to want to train and be in shape. It killed that and my sex drive. The only time you can f**k is when you take coke." 
Odom also revealed the current state of his relationship to Khloe Kardashian, how his daughter urged him to stick with his rehab program, and more. You can read the entire thing over at Us . If there's any bright side to the whole affair, it's that Odom does say that he's doing better now. 
"Living sober, meaning no drugs, is a great feeling," he said. "You’re getting Lamar now."
